name: Shiny Happy Illustrations
description:
A collection of fully customizable illustrations of people and scenes inspired by music, nature, and sports.


All the doodles in this project were made with Blush, which means that you can edit them however you want! You can mix different hairstyles, with upper bodies, positions, arms, backgrounds, and stickers. Just mash-up elements to create different characters and scenes. They're like legos, made of vectors!


Install the Blush plugin so you can customize everything.
